overview: "Tepli and Me" tells the story of a man named Ramin (Hassan Majouni) who studied directing but because he did not write attractive screenplays, he had to work in an art training center with his friend Katayoun (Mitra Hajar). One day he accidentally finds his childhood character named Tepli (Samiar Mohammadi) in his house and after consulting a psychologist, he realizes that Tepli came from the past to something that has destroyed Ramin's self-confidence. Tell him to let Ramin travel in the past and prevent that from happening, but.
title: Topoli Va Man
